product_name: CHANELHYDRA BEAUTY MICRO CREME YEUX Illuminating Hydrating Eye Cream
summary: SummaryThe first CHANEL eye cream featuring MicroFluidic Technology, a patented process that encapsulates the power of White Camellia Extract within thousands of micro-droplets.
details: DetailsFeaturesThe fast-absorbing formula helps strengthen the delicate eye area and reduces the appearance of puffiness, dark circles and fine lines.Composed of 91% naturally derived ingredients, HYDRA BEAUTY MICRO CRÈME YEUX is enriched with White Camellia Extract to deeply hydrate skin and help fortify the moisture barrier.Algae extract and a tetrapeptide target the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, while pearlescent micro-pigments illuminate the look of the eye area.Item 2611399How To UseApply a small amount around the eyes and perform LE GESTE BEAUTÉ DU REGARD:Smooth from eyelids to brows, then massage from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye. Repeat.Smooth from the outer corner of the eye to the temple. Repeat.For the under-eye area, start at the outer corner and smooth toward the temple, working closer to the inner corner with each stroke. Repeat.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, Betaine, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diglycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Camellia Japonica Flower Water, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Rhodophyceae Extract, Faex (Yeast Extract), Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Castor Oil/Ipdi Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Alumina, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Dipropylene Glycol, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Astragalus Gummifer Gum, Glucose, Pentylene Glycol, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, CI 40800 (Beta-Carotene), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Mica, BS000038A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount around the eyes and perform LE GESTE BEAUTÉ DU REGARD:Smooth from eyelids to brows, then massage from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye. Repeat.Smooth from the outer corner of the eye to the temple. Repeat.For the under-eye area, start at the outer corner and smooth toward the temple, working closer to the inner corner with each stroke. Repeat.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: The cream is very good, but it's strange that the cream is already three years old.

reviews.headline: Hydrating!
reviews.comments: The skin around my eyes tends to get so dry it hurts. I've searched high and low for an eye cream that hydrates this delicate area... and voilà! It's a splurge but a little goes a long way. The illuminating effect is visible but modest. I like keeping my jar in the fridge for that extra cooling/depuffing effect. Definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Love it!!!
reviews.comments: I bought this and absolutely love it!! I will definitely buy it again!!

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: this was so good and made my skin so much better and the hydration i was getting from it was crazy

rollup.name: HYDRA BEAUTY MICRO CRÈME YEUX Illuminating Hydrating Eye Cream
